alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 10:06PM CDT until July 07 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Western Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Wichita County in northern Texas... East central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1005 PM CDT, the leading edge of winds from a line of severe thunderstorms was located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Hollister to 8 miles southwest of Loveland to 4 miles south of Harrold, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Burkburnett, Walters, Electra, Geronimo, Grandfield, Chattanooga, Randlett, Devol, Faxon, Hollister, Loveland, Cookietown, Harrold, Sheppard AFB, Haynesville, and Cashion. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
